description: Try our easy to follow Veal Olives Filled with Provolone & Basil recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mains,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Veal,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Veal Olives Filled with Provolone & Basil Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tablespoons of the oil in an ovenproof casserole dish over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 4 minutes or until tender. Stir in rice, coating well with oil. Add lemon rind, 1/4 cup lemon juice and chicken stock to rice, stirring until well combined. Bring to the boil. Cover and place in the oven. Bake for 20 minutes or until liquid has almost evaporated. Season with salt and pepper.
Meanwhile, place a veal schnitzel onto a flat surface. Top with 2 tablespoons of cheese and 2 basil leaves. Roll up, enclosing filling and secure with a toothpick. Repeat with remaining.

Heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook veal rolls for 4-5 minutes or until browned on all sides. Transfer to a baking tray. Place on bottom shelf of the oven to finish cooking.
Put lemon halves into hot frying pan and cook for 12 minutes or until golden.
Serve veal olives with lemon risotto and caramelised lemon halves.
